website_summaries.verdict: A solid contender in an end table that offers a sleek and simple look to enhance a variety of rooms.
pros: Users appreciate the fast and easy assembly and good quality for the price
We love the rich appearance of the espresso wood-look finish and extra versatility of this end table to be used in small spaces
cons: Quality control was an issue for some, as users sometimes reported tables arriving with defects or damage

customer_reviews.title: Good Small Table
customer_reviews.text: Nice small table looks nice, is sturdy, and I just ordered another one. The picture shows an assembly tip to help assemble the lower shelf with only one person. Turn the table upside down after attaching the legs, and then use the shipping box to hold the lower shelf in place while screwing it in place. The box is the perfect height to do this. See the attached photo.
customer_reviews.author: Camijomo

customer_reviews.title: Pungent, persistent, room-filling toxic smell for three weeks and counting...
customer_reviews.text: As of this writing, I received a pair of these tables three weeks ago. They reeked of whatever toxic goo they're coated with so badly, I had to put all the pieces outside as soon as I opened the cartons. I was hoping by now they'd have off-gassed whatever it is that smells like a toxic waste dump, but three weeks on and they're still terrible. Going to put these right into the garbage can. Even without the wretched odor, I get the impression these things wouldn't last long. Legs are made of compressed paper.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Perye - Rogue Estate BBQ

customer_reviews.title: Great table for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small table for my upstairs hallway. This one was perfect. It came quickly and was very well packaged. I live alone and I cannot lift heavy objects and this needed to go upstairs. It took me about 15 minutes to assemble - everything is supplied except a Phillips screwdriver. I plan on purchasing the matching coffee table. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: AllyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect look
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for something small and cheap, look no further. This console is perfect for a small space or for a decorative piece. Easy to assemble and sleek looking.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua G.

customer_reviews.title: Reeks of formaldehyde, adhesives, etc...
customer_reviews.text: Lesson learned, don't buy cheap furniture online. This product reeks of chemicals, it stinks up my whole apartment. Purchased to use as a night table and can't bear the thought of putting that thing anywhere near my head. I'm hoping it will off-gas, but after looking at other reviews I am guessing that it won't. Products made with so much toxic material can off-gas for years, even after they've stopped smelling bad. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: hnm

customer_reviews.title: Smells!
customer_reviews.text: This table was exactly what i wanted, but after it was in our house a short while, my husband (who has a very sensitive olefactory system) started to detect a chemical smell emanating from it, making him nauseous and giving him headaches. We wiped the table down and put it outside to air out a number of times, to no avail. Now my husband doesn't want it in the house. So if you are sensitive to smells, I'd look at something different.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Lenk

customer_reviews.title: Keeping this piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Its not going to last forever and QC is lacking, but it does look nice and will suit my purpose for buying it for the time being. I ordered two and on one of these I had to remove one corner block, take the brads out, and secure with super glue. It was about 3/4" off and the bottom shelf would not line up properly. Overall I could not build and paint this for less, so I would buy another one. Be prepared to modify it to assemble properly. Other than the modification, someone with normal mechanical ability can put this thing together in about 3 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: toxic packaging WARNING-luv table perfect size easy to assemble,
customer_reviews.text: luv table opened box to assemble. and started to put it together. the fumes from box burned my eyes,they began to water, took a zyrtec tablet. around nose and mouth got really tingly . washed my face and hands. carried box and table outside after 2 days smell from table is better not gone. however around my mouth and nose my skin is chapped and really rough.the first day after opening box I caledl skin care specialist and they advised to wash face with warm mild soap and apply a moisturizer and this is day 5 skin still chapped but its better..like table but it has chemical -toxic problem
customer_reviews.author: Janet S. Russ

customer_reviews.title: Nice but....
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews before purchasing but didn't think a smell could be that bad. IT WAS! A VERY strong chemical spell to it. I had to place it outside on 2 separate occasions for several days. Wiped down with 409, clorox wipes and sprayed with lysol. I have never purchased anything with such an overwhelming scent. After about a month it wore off and is otherwise a good product but buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect table!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic table! I am using it as a sofa table in a little hallway outside the upstairs bedrooms. Looks great, perfect size, would also be a great end table. I am so happy with the purchase, the price is great and assembly took 10 minutes - I just laid shelf on bottom, did not screw in and it's fine. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: TerriD

customer_reviews.title: It is simple to screw the legs into the top but it does not come with washers and it would be nice to have a warning to not over tighten
customer_reviews.text: Table does not come with directions, not that they are needed. It is simple to screw the legs into the top but it does not come with washers and it would be nice to have a warning to not over tighten. While putting on the first leg the support cracked, and I'm not even that strong. It also comes with wood screws to attach the bottom shelf which is difficult to do as the shelf floats when upside down, I didn't even bother. Wished I had shopped around more before setting on this.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMMO

customer_reviews.title: Great for price!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for little end tables! The expresso is a very deep cherry color which is exactly what I was looking for to go next to my couch by our front door. It is the perfect height for a standard couch falling just below the arm. Mine came completely undamaged and took only a few minutes to put together. I love that it has a bottom shelf for extra storage. I put a little basket on it to hold keys as some other reviews said it doesn’t hold up to repeated use and scratches but it looks great to start. Will be ordering another one for the other couch. Great little table for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Speters

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, smells and was defective
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this table and it came damaged. I was not sure if it was from shipping, but it appeared so. I did not inspect the entire table since one of the first things I removed from the box was damaged on the corner. I asked for a replacement and it arrived today and is also being sent back - this time for a refund. The quality is awful with missing laminate on the side of the top piece and a defective top surface. Would not recommend this product. It also has a very strong chemical smell to it - both orders did.
customer_reviews.author: JCK

customer_reviews.title: Great little table
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice. Stable, not wobbly. Using it as a side table for my recliner. Was extremely easy to assemble with one exception which is the reason for 4 stars rather than 5. The bottom shelf is supposed to be screwed onto the legs. However, there are no pilot holes for the screws. I considered drilling some myself, but decided not to bother. The table was quite sturdy without the shelf, so I simply sat the shelf on the supports. Table is still quite sturdy. This might have been a deal breaker if you were without a drill and inexperienced in assembling things. However, it works (for me) quite well without screwing in the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Harris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These tables are great. We purchased 3 of these end tables. All 3 were well packaged, very easy to assemble, sturdy. No blemishes, or scratches. I didn't attach the bottom shelf (I may later), the bottom shelf inserts easily and sits on the ledges well. I would recommend them. We have a Crown Mark dining table set (not purchased on Amazon), and their barstools (purchased on Amazon) - these end tables match with them very well. Excellent quality furniture. Our newly remodeled home is finally coming together furniture wise. Decorating takes time (and $$), I'm glad I searched around and found these end tables.
customer_reviews.author: Rena Womack

customer_reviews.title: Build quality is questionable
customer_reviews.text: Can no longer recommend I have two of these. The first I bought a long while ago. It was easy to put together and has been a good little piece of furniture. The second I got recently and my experience with is was quite the opposite. While assembling, the thing basically came apart in my hands. The leg shattered when screwing it to the main piece. I was able to salvage it with some hardware I had lying around but it was ugly. Lucky for me it is in a corner and hidden; I really only needed the surface, and it serves that purpose. However, I will not be buying anymore as I cannot trust the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C

customer_reviews.title: a million uses
customer_reviews.text: You will find a million uses for this little table. We purchased it for our temporary apartment when we moved from the west to the east coast. Even if we disposed of it in the end, it is more than worth the price of only 30 bucks; certainly a lot cheaper than furniture rental. But we kept the dark stained wood table and also bought one in black when we moved to our new home. The styling is simple, no shaping to the wood, but it is well finished.
customer_reviews.author: Pasadena Boop

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Because of the low price, I knew not to expect much when I ordered this table. I’ve been pricing furniture and most tables like this were in the seventy five dollar range. What a wonderful surprise! The table came well packed with no damage. It was easy to assemble. I didn’t bother to attach the lower shelf because I t rests securely enough for my usage. The color is as pictured with the edges being much darker than the middle of the top. If you’re on a budget, or even if you’re not, I recommend this table. It looks just as good as the more expensive tables I priced at the furniture stores.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Quality is questionable...
customer_reviews.text: The price isn't too bad but the quality is iffy. I bought 2 of these tables and both had issues. Both tables were uneven when assembled and needed thick felt pads under one leg to make them stable. One table has an indentation on the edge of the top that is visible and the other one has 3 pock marks in the finish of the shelf. Also there are no starter holes in the bottom of the shelves to screw into, so a lot of strength is needed to attach the shelf. Thank goodness my hubby was here to help me.
customer_reviews.author: MIMI

customer_reviews.title: Almost the perfect size to fit rackmount equipment. Beware of splinters.
customer_reviews.text: While not the intended use at all, I found this table to be almost the perfect height to fit a piece of standard rackmount equipment vertically. (You'll need to use a piece of 3/4" plywood on the bottom to center the rack ears.) This allowed me to mount a power amplifier right next to the couch, with at least 2U to spare for more equipment down the line. The only downside was how terribly splintery the wood is -- I gave myself a rather bad splinter just removing one of the legs from the packaging. This warrants docking a star even at this price, as I've assembled much lower quality furniture with no splinters.
customer_reviews.author: nookkin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, attractive, great height, versatile
customer_reviews.text: This table is surprisingly sturdy (on carpet & wood floors) and far more attractive than I thought it'd be for the price. Easy to move & versatile. The first one I bought was for the office to hold a mini-server near my desk. It was easy to put together & nice looking. When we prepared for our major house renovation, I bought a couple in a different finish to act as night stands. Later to hold files & things until I got my office set up. Now as temporary end tables for the family room sofa. They've turned out to be a better purchase than the price would indicate!
customer_reviews.author: Erma

customer_reviews.title: Solid unit easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Nice little side table, very solid and easy to assemble. Only thing buyers should be warned about is it needs to air out. The paint or whatever that is on this has a horrendous and very strong caustic smell. It will probably go away with time but you'll need to be prepared to let it air out for a while...maybe a few days in the sun would do it I don't know, but it is bad.
customer_reviews.author: Deltaleader71

customer_reviews.title: Great tables!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these tables today! I love them! Perfect for the area that we have. I was looking for narrow end tables and these for the bill! The quality is amazing! They arrived in excellent condition. The packaging is incredible and easy to see how they come delivered without ANY flaws or blemishes. So easy to put together! I was waiting for my husband to get home. NAH! I’ve got this. Took 15 minutes to put together 2 tables and I am not mechanical in any way. The color and style looks almost identical to our Ashley coffee table. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Csp

customer_reviews.title: I wanted side tables. My puppy wanted a perch.
customer_reviews.text: I love these tables. They are a great place to set down your drink or reading. They are just the right height for both my couch and my club chair. It was easy to assemble (my husband finished them in a few minutes before he left for work) and they look so good (the veneer looks like a rich wood rather than a cheap finish). It is also very sturdy. We got a puppy shortly after these arrived and she likes to walk from the couch out on to these (yes, we're working on it). She's twenty-five pounds...they don't even shake.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kittrell

customer_reviews.title: Like It!
customer_reviews.text: It came packaged well and it was easy to assemble. I did notice a slight odor but, for me, it quickly dissipated. Maybe I am hard of smelling. I don't know. It appears well constructed and solid. In my opinion, a great buy for $35. I took off one star because, on my particular unit, there were some very minor imperfections in the finish (some minor streaking). It's hardly noticeable, though. Update: There definitely is an odor. After leaving the room and then returning, I can definitely smell it. However, I quickly get used to it and no longer notice. It doesn't change my overall review.
customer_reviews.author: Knarf Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: one table fell apart
customer_reviews.text: awhile ago, I bought two tables (separate purchases) and two for my daughter's house. One of my tables just completely fell apart.. I couldn't push/hammer/tap the nails back in. The screws wouldn't screw in properly at all. I ended up throwing it out and am now just using my 2nd table. the two tables I bought for my daughter seem like they're fine. We didn't have any chemical smell as others have had. I can't get a replacement table as they are out of stock (Now, I know why) or some sellers are selling them for way more than I'm willing to pay.
customer_reviews.author: Jla127

customer_reviews.title: Love this table!
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful, well built, sturdy, and very easy to assemble! I bought it to use as a plant stand for my orchids, and it's perfect for that. I just ordered another one for the small TV in my den. There are no pre-drilled holes for attaching the lower shelf, but that was an easy fix. I put it together by myself in 5 minutes. This is a prize- winner!.
customer_reviews.author: SW Virginia Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will 100% need a drill to put these together.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions say all you need is a screwdriver to put this table together. I have no idea how they figure that because the bottom shelf piece has no holes pre-drilled and the wood is far too hard to hand-screw with a screwdriver. We had to drill our own holes, which was a massive pain and it took forever to build as a result. What could've been a 10 minute process turned into an hour and a half one. If you don't mind doing all that, the tables do look nice assembled and are perfect for smaller spaces. The bottom shelf is a nice sturdy storage area.
customer_reviews.author: Adis

customer_reviews.title: Nice table, but watch the mounting screws embedded in the legs
customer_reviews.text: This arrived today. i was surprised at the quality of it until we got the assembling it. So, you get what you pay for. the mounting screws in the legs of the table that are embedded are not always glues or secured into them tightly. As I assembled the table the last leg "stripped" out and the mounting screw would not seat tightly. So that leg was dangling and would not sit properly. My only choice was to send the entire thing back and wait for a replacement. Nope. I will glue the mounting screw back into the leg and just deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together & Worth the Money 💰💰💰💰💰💰
customer_reviews.text: For i got this item Because I was with an Cable tv 📺 provider that I had to drop because if I was to have the equment replaced for I would be getting an refurbish & so I went with another Cable tv & internet & home phone provider & so I needed this to put my 2 home phone's & my answering machine & on the bottom shelf my radio controlled Harley Davidson V Rod Motorcycle. For it is worth the Money 💰 & Easy to put together with the Instructions Manual & the tools needed that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: John Crump

customer_reviews.title: Great table but has a chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: This table is great looking and very sturdy for the price. Works great for where I wanted to use it. It is in my bedroom. A big drawback is the smell, like chemicals or something. I was not too concerned in the beginning. But I have had it for awhile and I can still smell it. The only reason I have not returned it is because it is summer and the windows are open making the smell less noticeable but there is still a smell. I may have to remove it from my bedroom if it does not improve once the windows need to stay closed.
customer_reviews.author: nanalinda

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Chinese Product
customer_reviews.text: Like just about every other "Amazon Choice" product sold, do not be fulled by all of the shill reviews for this product, or the rather English "Crown Mark Pierce" name. This thing smells like a chemical lab and should not even be sold, IMO. I let it air outside for multiple days to try and get the smell to go away, and even after all of that, I brought it into my house and was still getting headaches from the fumes coming off this thing. Promptly returned and paid more for American made!
customer_reviews.author: Sattva

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with this piece for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I went into this purchase expecting an un-sturdy particle board table, I didn't want to spend a lot since it's really just a decorative piece to fill an blank space. Boy was i surprised, this piece is actually fairly sturdy and appears to be made at least mostly of solid wood. It was also very easy to put together, 4 bolts to attach the legs to the table top, and 4 screws to attach the bottom shelf to the legs. I do have some concerns that the black finish may scratch easily, but i will update my review if that becomes an issue. I topped the table with a rectangular succulent planter, and i'm very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ash Harris

customer_reviews.title: Stinks like chemicals
customer_reviews.text: The table looks fine, and was easy to assemble. Seems nice... BUT IT STINKS. The cheap paint they used produces HUGE amounts of off-gassing. Whatever it is, I'm sure it's probably toxic. We placed this table in a large room (20x30) and the entire room smells filled with paint fumes. We've been leaving the table outside for several days in the sun to attempt to cook off the paint smell. After three days outside, we brought it inside... and when we returned from work, the house smelled like toxic paint fumes again. Next place we put this table is the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: fine for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am pleased with this purchase. The tables fit in the space I have, and mine arrived with no defects. They assemble easily with an included allen wrench and a power screwdriver. There are no pilot holes for the screws where you screw them into the shelves, so if you don't have a power screwdriver, I hope you have a power drill to (carefully) create them. The tables are sturdy enough for my purposes (table lamps and small items), though I would not put anything heavy on them. The black finish is quite glossy, so it shows fingerprints.
customer_reviews.author: Tasia in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: This is my 2nd table!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the first one but spilled nail polish on it accidentally. I loved this table so much I ordered another one and am much more careful with my new table. This is a great skinny table that holds just about anything! It is stable and can hold a basket of different things on top with a lamp and on the bottom I put books and magazines. You will love this table as it is high quality and solid NOT flimsy like other tables out there!
customer_reviews.author: D. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Love it, minus one star for 1 bolt & 1 screw missing
customer_reviews.text: We've collected extra hardware over the years & usually can find what we need in our stash or ace is right around the corner. This little table is great. Our livingroom is big but has a weird layout do to the kitchen angling into the area.. our furniture is set up weird to make the space work and remain open. We have a 3pc table set but it doesn't work out. I needed more end tables that wouldnt take up a lot of space. These work great. I plan on getting them as guest room night stands and end tables for our Airbnb.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Smells!  BAD!
customer_reviews.text: This furniture really smells of awful chemical smell. It's been set up and airing out for almost four days, and it still smells in the room! We are not even the ultra-sensitive type that can smell a new bar of soap from across the house. It just really reeks. Wondering if it will ever air out, or we should just toss it in the dumpster. Oh, and it's an inch shorter than the listing says which was kind of a bummer for us.
customer_reviews.author: The Magnus Effect

customer_reviews.title: it is a pretty good deal
customer_reviews.text: This table was to be placed between a wall and a couch. It perfectly aligns with my couch's arm rest. For the price, it is a pretty good deal, not the best, not the worst. However, the bottom shelf was a bit challenging as there were no holes to insert the bottom level and we had to make holes by screwing in the parts with our full body weight to make the holes. Other than that, it is functional and fits our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Marie

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I hoped. Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first. I didn’t think a piece of furniture for $35 would be acceptable for my family room, especially since we just remodeled last year and spent a considerable amount of money on everything else. However I’m pleased to say I was wrong! This little table is just perfect. The perfect size, substantially-built, of considerable weight and quality, the ideal color to coordinate with my other wood pieces and absolutely ideal next to my leather chaise lounge. I couldn’t be happier. And my husband was able to assemble it in less than15 minutes! I highly recommend this chairside table.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy M.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great peice of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Great piece for the price! Put this together in about 15 mins. Very sturdy and works perfectly as an end table in our living room. Only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it arrived slightly damaged. And I mean VERY slightly. The bottom shelf was dinged a tiny bit on the corner. But it’s the bottom piece that no one will ever see. So it’s not a big deal. But it makes me wonder if others have had the same experience. Over all, you can’t beat the price. Thinking of getting a couple more as night stands for our kids rooms. I just wish they came in more color.
customer_reviews.author: WhitneyM.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Have 2 of these, very sturdy even with a 20lb cat landing and jumping off of them. Do not stain from wet glasses, but we don't have that many on them and I wipe up asap. Space saving for sure, super handy between 2 recliners, where you want to be close, but not share a reclining loveseat due to the other person disturbing your comfort when they change position. Sometime in the future I hope to purchase 4 more. Love 'em that much!!
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Decent table with small flaws.  You get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. The good: Easy to assemble Sturdy Fits in small spaces The bad: Had multiple spots of an inch to a few inches that were chipped/missing paint. We ordered the black model so just used a sharpie to fix the spots. Way too much hassle to pack up and send back for the price. Overall: A nice little table but expect some touch up to be needed if you want to hide it's flaws from shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Adc

customer_reviews.title: Works for us
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old was able to assemble these tables easily and quickly. We moved into a smaller house recently and needed smaller tables to get things to really fit right. These are affordable and work great. They hold a lamp, your glass and a notebook easily. They look good and seem sturdy enough. We left the bottom shelf off one as it would cover a heater vent and have had no problems with it this way. The ones with the shelf are against a wall making then a great place for my husband work laptop and mine holds my nursing pillow, making both easily accessible by not on the floor or in the way.
customer_reviews.author: homeschoolmom5Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Very nice side table
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice side table, sturdy, classy looking. Packaging was actually excellent, and I was impressed that screws were preassembled with their washers, and tightened together with a rubber band - nice attention to detail! The unit had no scratches or broken pieces. Overall very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: These are a great value and they do not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Moved to a new house and my old end tables were far too big to fit on either end of my couch. Sold those tables locally and ordered two of these since the dimensions fit perfectly. These tables are lower-priced than what I am used to spending so I was worried about the quality. Upon receiving and assembling, I have to say I am very impressed with what you get for the price. A reasonably sturdy table that is very usable in small spaces. Assembles very easily and I can't find anything negative to say about them. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: plonz

customer_reviews.title: Nice tables ..... NO SMELL
customer_reviews.text: Theses are two nice very nice tables for $38 each, we couldn’t be happier. They were easy to assemble, are sturdy, finished nice and exactly what we needed. I would like to add, we don’t understand what people are talking about when they talk about the smell..... the ones we got.... NO SMELL AT ALL...!!! They are great and we would definitely recommend them and would buy them again if needed...!!!
customer_reviews.author: vjb

customer_reviews.title: Very Solid Piece of Furniture
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Color that matches most all of my furniture, and very sturdy. Sofa and recliner height at 24" tall. Easy assemble for one person. Takes longer unpacking than assembling. Which is about 10 minutes tops. Table top dimensions are 24" long x12" wide. The Bottom Shelf is sturdy enough for me to load down all my Field & Stream Magazines. No stress or buckling whatsoever. Which adding the weight make this even more sturdy. And having had this for several months now, I think it will hold up well over time. Having this helps me minimize space where my typical style end tables won't fit. I would definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: MRH

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Table
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the quality for $30. It arrived mostly prebuilt - just one bolt needed to hold on each leg. The bolts included were already set up with washers on them. One screw for each corner of the bottom shelf. The top has very sturdy construction. And it looks good! I'd be more comfortable with two bolts per leg - which would be fairly easy to accomplish if I wanted to modify it, but it seems pretty sturdy as is. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Beware split orders!
customer_reviews.text: For some reason my one order was split in two, and I was mistakenly sent a brown table first. But the second go round, I received precisely, perfectly what I ordered. Unfortunately, the second table I received today to complete the order is a bit more scraped than I’d have liked and one of the legs is certainly askew and shorter than the others. So, of my “matching” end tables, I have one genuinely decent-looking table and one genuinely disappointingly visibly not-so-great, wobbly table. (I’ll attempt to return this one and try again...waiting another week or more to complete my living room.)
customer_reviews.author: Michael Vine

customer_reviews.title: Horrible offgassing
customer_reviews.text: The off-gassing from this piece is absolutely terrible. I thought it would fade and get better with time, but I've had these for two months, and they are still noticeably smelling of manufacturing. Other than that, they are great, but the smell is really bad. I left them in a side room with the window open for the first month I had them, and they were still really smelly after that.
customer_reviews.author: Maresian

customer_reviews.title: Pretty table and cheap price! Great bargain.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome table for $36 bucks. It's extremely simple to put together (use a drill gun with an Allen wrench screw) and is very sturdy. The bottom insert is nice and thick (see photos) and easy to screw in with gun. Looks pretty and matched my cherry wood furniture perfectly! Just know that the surface is sensitive so be very careful what you place on it (nothing cold or hot and don't clean with harsh products) and use coasters when needed. Comes with cleaning instructions. I am definitely buying another.
customer_reviews.author: April Land

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small table to use in a pretty fancy room for the next month or so. I had low expectations, considering the price. I even ordered the open box one because I expected it to get tossed soon, but it’s so nice! It took five minutes to put together, and now it’s looking pretty in a room with tables at 10 times the price. My host is definitely keeping it when I leave.
customer_reviews.author: AMarie

customer_reviews.title: Awful chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I have a limited space on each side of my bed. They fit perfect, however they have an Awful chemical smell. Not sure if I can handle it much longer. I tried to air them out outside, cleaned them all over really well a couple of times. Helped a little bit not much.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: Good little side table. I needed something long and narrow and this fit the bill perfectly. Nice color, went together quite fast. The bolts are predrilled but the screws for the lower shelf are not- or weren't on the one I received, but it was easy to screw in with brute force. Comes with a small Allen wrench for the bolts, make sure you have a Philips screw driver or bit for a drill handy as that is what the lower shelf needs for those screws.
customer_reviews.author: Tegan

customer_reviews.title: Finish doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Great look and design however after less than a year, the paint on the top is fading. When I clean the 2 tables I spray a hand towel with multipurpose cleaner and and it wipes away the paint fading it more - only one gets any direct sun and it’s not much. No assistance from the manufacturer on this either. I own a set in cherry from another manufacturer with the same design that I’ve had for 2 years and no issues with fading.
customer_reviews.author: James Owens

customer_reviews.title: Watch out: "Espresso" is actually "Cherry", otherwise decent table for the price (if you are looking for CHERRY)
customer_reviews.text: 1st off... this is not "Espresso". This is cherry... (even the sticker on the box is RED)... disappointing, but to be honest for once the product matches the picture... Otherwise the table arrived in decent shape (couple of damaged ends but finding that common with inexpensive furniture on Amazon). Easy enough to assemble, I chose not to "screw" new holes into the bottom shelf but rather let it rest. In part due to it not being required, but also because the design of the bottom shelf seems slightly flawed (short screws, screwing through bracket to shelf and either being too small (as appears to be) or they could risk going too deep...
customer_reviews.author: Bugalydosh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect side piece for bedroom reading chair...
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, heavy piece that was simple to put together and sturdy. The bottom shelf should keep it squared and stable. This is more of a ‘forever’ piece than a temporary fix. The dark espresso finish is ‘almost black’ and matches the wood accents on the chair perfectly. This table put together would probably sell for $150 or more in an upscale furniture store.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: There was no offensive odor as is sometimes the case with products like this from China
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this for several days. There was no offensive odor as is sometimes the case with products like this from China, it seems sturdy, the color is what I expected, the instructions were sufficient to put it together and other than a Phillip's head screwdriver, they include a hex key to tighten the screws that hold the legs on. I like it, I have it setting aside of my recliner
customer_reviews.author: busterbrown885

customer_reviews.title: Basic tables to fit in narrow spaces
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these tables to fit on either end of our sofa, where there is not a lot of room between the sofa and the wall. They work perfectly for this purpose, and are of sufficient quality that they don't scream "cheap" on casual observation. A close inspection will show that they're not the highest-quality furniture you'll buy, but they serve the purpose. They are a bit wobbly but felt table leg spacers make that issue go away. Otherwise no issues with assembly or placement near the sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Inferior quality. Blemishes on the legs and the edges of the top of the table are loose- there are strips of fake wood adhered to particle board. I had to glue them down to keep them from hanging off of the corners. This piece is cheap looking and will be used only until I find the perfect side table for the living room. Works for now but I don’t expect to have it for long. It will probably wind up in the unfinished part of the basement to hold odds and ends. You’ll want to spend a little more money if you’re looking for a decent side table, like we will be doing in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni1028

customer_reviews.title: Looks great even with the highlighted blemishes
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid for this table I feel that I got my money's worth. I realize that some products get scratched or dented during transit but the small blemishes on the table I received had markings from the QA inspection. I initially didn't notice the small dents on one side of the table but I did notice the circle and checkmark underneath the blemishes. I would have been happier with the product if their QA department didn't use a sharpie marker to point out small dents.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Piece of CRAP!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these. One looked like it was put together by a one-eyed blind man! See in photos how out-of-square the frame under the top is. There are blemishes in the cheap wood that was merely lacquered over with the black color. Some of the wood in the corner of the legs where the leg attaches to that frame was split due to the manufacturer over-tightening the screws. Too much of a pain in the neck to try to return all this mess, so I'll live with it. Would have given 1-star if the 2nd table was as bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice what you would expect.
customer_reviews.text: No thrills here. Just a nice little table. Very sturdy and easy to put together. Have a lamp on it and nothing on bottom shelf at this time so seems to be pretty sturdy. Not sure how much I would put on the bottom shelf, I would not go to crazy. I like it and the price I think was good for what it is. Again just a simple little table. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce D.

customer_reviews.title: Love this table.
customer_reviews.text: Well made-- solid. good finish. slightly rounded corners so there aren't sharp edges to beat yourself up on. Size-wise, it really seemed custom made for what i needed-- i had a bit of trouble trying to find something before i happened upon this-- and price is great also! Honestly, I couldn't be happier-- i've gotten a lot of things lately to improve home and this may have been my top (or top 2) purchases in satisfaction
customer_reviews.author: Brent J. Trembath

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table for my wife to use at the top of the stairs, so she would not come home from work and pile her things on the floor. It was creating a bit of a sprawl and neither of us were happy with it. This table works perfectly. It took only a few minutes to assemble, and it looks nice and holds everything it needs to hold. Plus, it's sturdy. It doesn't wobble at all, and her purse is heavy. I saw tables like this at various brick and mortar stores for a lot more money, but I took a chance on this one because of the reasonable pricing and I wasn't disappointed at all. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Clan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, nice for our living room space.
customer_reviews.text: We got this end table (and lamp) from Amazon to go with our new furniture and we absolutely love it. The end table is just the right height and has a nice shelf on the bottom. The assembly was easy - probably no more than 15 minutes to assemble. Definitely recommended if you're looking to add a little something - or storage space - to your living space.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice side table
customer_reviews.text: It's a simple table, but very well made, and it fits perfectly next to my sofa, the size is perfect. UPDATE: I ordered a second table since I liked it so much, however, they sent me the WRONG COLOR, I ordered black and I got Espresso, the funny thing is that the box states the color as black, it seems someone at the factory didn't pay attention. I will keep the 5 stars rating since the table came without damage and it's a nice table, I can live with the wrong color, still matches my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Dude

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with our purchase of four of these tables.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased four of these side tables for our living room and they are perfect for what we were looking for. We had none of the dings or scratches that others have mentioned, and packing was perfect. Assembly was a cinch and very easy. They are a simple design, but aesthetically pleasing as well as functional. I would buy again if the need arose. Recommended at this great price!
customer_reviews.author: Frank E. TrinkleTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for spinters
customer_reviews.text: Others commented on the lack of predrilled holes for the bottom shelf. True, but not an issue, even for someone with weak, tiny appendages like Cheeto von Babyhands. I was able to place the unit upside down, turn the delivery box on its side and wedge it between the two shelves to hold the bottom shelf in place while I attached the bottom shelf with screws, using a ratcheting screwdriver. Parents of small children: please note that the edges are quite sharp, and I am taking off one star because I got two splinters as I dusted off the unit with a paper towel.
customer_reviews.author: Ell

customer_reviews.title: Tough little table.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be used as a side table for my mother. She likes to have things near her recliner, and doesn't get around so well, so it only made sense to set her up with something to put her stuff on. It is a little big for this purpose, but we were able to make it work. The wood is decent quality, and the fasteners are good as well. If I had need for one I would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: big daddy

customer_reviews.title: Such an amazing deal!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set. They arrived in perfect condition, very quickly, and were easy to assemble. Amazing quality for the price. Such a great deal. I struggled to find the right dimensions for couch-side tables. These are perfect if you're looking for end tables that don't take up a lot of space. They're great!
customer_reviews.author: stringlark62

customer_reviews.title: Classy look, easy assembly! (Even the bottom shelf!)
customer_reviews.text: Well made, nice finish. Other reviewers commented that they couldn’t manage to get the bottom shelf attached with screws, BUT I found a solution for that. It just so happens that the box the table is shipped in is the right width to support the bottom shelf while it is still upside-down. I placed it diagonally to support two corners (see photo) and then used a regular Phillips screwdriver with a reasonable amount of pressure to put in the screws. Then I moved the box to support the other two corners and finished. No pre-drilling needed.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was thoroughly surprised with this product. We needed something small to be a nightstand in our guest bedroom. Not only was this the perfect size, but the color was exactly as pictured and almost perfectly matches our existing furniture. I put this together by myself (to prove to my husband that it wasn't going to be that hard), in a little over 10 minutes. It really was THAT easy. A few screws (but do yourself a favor and get a drill to help with the screwing), and it was DONE. So far, the quality seems great, and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jill M.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Little Table
customer_reviews.text: The first table I received was scratched. I requested another one and they sent it immediately. I then picked the pieces from both sets to make the best table. It was easy to assemble except I couldn’t get the screws in the bottom to attach the bottom shelf but they aren’t necessary; the bottom shelf stays put. I love the look of the table and it works perfectly beside my chair.
customer_reviews.author: kyyadifan

customer_reviews.title: Lovely color, well made. Perfect fit for my application.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table. My bathroom has a wall and vanity cabinet in Espresso and I wanted a relatively narrow table to put in there. The Espresso color can vary significantly when you purchase furniture and I was so happy to see that it matched perfectly. Assembly was a snap: put four bolts in to hold the legs on and then put in the bottom shelf. It comes with screws in case you want to secure the bottom shelf, but I have no problem with it being loose or ineffective without the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I had 12 inches of space between the wall and my bed, so purchased this to use as a night stand. It fit perfectly. The only problem I had was not being able to screw on the bottom shelf in two out of four places. There are no pre drilled holes, but even when pushing hard with a screwdriver I was unable to get some of the screws in. And there was some splitting of the wood on one of the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Warriorcat27

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: Better than I could of possibly imagined. I've been looking something for exactly this size for a while now. I had a small space that I wanted to put a spare computer on. It fit perfectly, is very sturdy, and is much better quality than you would expect for the low price. The espresso color has a very beautiful, colorful undertone and makes it look like a much more expensive piece than it is. Good purchase, will be purchasing another, and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Mayne

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to put together and use
customer_reviews.text: This meets our needs, well. It is not top of the line furniture but was easy to put together and works, well. It may be slightly wobbly on hard floors but that may also be the floor. It seems to be stable enough for our needs. Haven't noticed it being unstable since we put it together. We have two positioned between recliners. We like them. We placed a couple of small baskets on the bottom shelves.
customer_reviews.author: cpshalom

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Can fit a gaming desktop comfortably
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty sturdy as it can fit a full sized ATX cased Desktop Gaming Rig. Well worth the price too! When you first get it make sure you tap the plastic toe on each foot as shipping seems to leave these a little loose. Otherwise this is a great product for the price Will be adding my sound system to the bottom deck of this table next week.
customer_reviews.author: Zepherius

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I took it out of the box screwed it together flipped it over to stand it up. one second and the leg broke off. I only read about these types of review ans thought they were BS, but it happened to me true story. I have picture but there is no were to attach them to. Do not buy waste of time and money literally a piece of garbage!
customer_reviews.author: jsara05

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: I spent quite a while looking for a long thin table for my mouse pad/mouse. My current desk does not have room for them on my keyboard stand, so I improvised. I did have to get risers to make it a bit taller, but otherwise the table is great. Very sturdy, easy to put together, and seems like it will last through gaming sessions just fine. Perfect for a mouse stand!
customer_reviews.author: B. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The item came damaged. I try to return it but ran across 2 problems. They charge you to ship it back and a 20% restocking fee. So I hade to keep a end table that looked used. The overall of the material is cheap. It does look good if it wasn't damaged. I don't think it would last long if you had kids. It's a good thing I don't.
customer_reviews.author: Katina Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Much sturdier than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: Great little table, but it is definitely on the short side, I thought it was taller! Overall, a really great table, the only downside is that it wants you to screw in the bottom shelf (the screws are provided) but there are no pre-drilled holes. It still works and I just set the bottom shelf on top of it, but I can see that shelf getting lost in a move pretty easily if I don't secure it.
customer_reviews.author: Lunaap33

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size but smell horrible
customer_reviews.text: This is hard to review. I really love the size of these tables. They will fit perfectly to each side of my dresser. BUT. Holy moly they STINK. They have this horrible chemical smell like a mix of bad paint, glue and something else. Bad enough to leave a taste in your mouth! So I have put them outside with a hope and prayer the smell goes away or I’ll have to return them. Picture is of them on the covered porch.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our modest need
customer_reviews.text: These inexpensive end tables were better than expected, and did not smell as I had read some do. They are perfect for our simple needs though someone with more expensive taste may want to look for ...more expensive tables made of solid hardwood. Easy to put together, the two tables were in service 30 minutes after arrival.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Strong off gassing!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the table. Looks great, is sturdy and was easy to put together. The only downfall is that I'm very sensitive to smells and this thing about knocked me out with it's off-gassing! I had to crank up the air purifier and set the table next to it for a few days. No problems after that.
customer_reviews.author: Cbutzkazoo

customer_reviews.title: Toxic Smell!
customer_reviews.text: This product assembled easily enough. A few nicks and some blemishes but not a big deal for what I am using it for. The smell, however, is terrible, as many others reported. It reeks of a strong chemical smell, most likely the finish. It is overpowering for someone who has even a slight problem with very strong odors. I like the table well enough otherwise but can only hope the smell diminishes enough to bring inside. If you have an aversion to strong smells, avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice little side table night stand for my bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: great product, needed a mini night stand due to not having much space next to my bed. This table was the perfect choice easy to assemble and looks very good and sturdy. Would recommend this to anyone who would like a small table or use it like me as a small night stand. This product was delivered very promptly too.
customer_reviews.author: hedge hog

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly and was exactly what I wanted. I was delighted to find extremely easy to read and understand instructions as well as well-organized hardware for assembly (the screws, and bolts were pre-assembled and rubber-banded together). That along with the included allen wrench made assembly a breeze. It was the easiest thing I have ever assembled! It is well made and fits perfect between our recliners--allowing ample space for keeping the remote or snacks in order to share them! My laptop fits nicely on the bottom shelf for easy access when I want to do more online shopping. :)
customer_reviews.author: nanomcgee

customer_reviews.title: Two Edged Comment
customer_reviews.text: This a two edged comment. Love the style, color and size of the table but it stinks to high heaven. We put it outside to see if the stench would go away but still smelly. We will see what happens after a few more days
customer_reviews.author: CarolAnn

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this table is really good. I've assembled a lot of these types of furniture and this one is by far heads and shoulders above anything this cheap I've assembled. I was most impressed that the screws had thread lock on them. Usually the weakest part of one of these builds. Everything loosens up over time. Everything was square after assembly. Look great. I bought it for it's unusual small size to put a Keurig on in my office.
customer_reviews.author: On the Job

customer_reviews.title: Great little side table!
customer_reviews.text: This side table came exactly as described. It was extremely easy to assemble. The bottom piece comes with screws but no pre-aligned holes to attach it, however, it rests on the 4 little leg ledges so it really doesn't need to be screwed down. It seems from the instructions that you are just to screw into the ledges without holes or, like other reviewers have said, they just drilled a couple of holes. I love it for my little home office!
customer_reviews.author: LiliBelle

customer_reviews.title: Wow, there must be 2 versions of this table, mine is particle wood with veneers not solid wood as some reviews say ???
customer_reviews.text: Wow, there must be 2 versions of this table mine is particle wood with veneers, The underside panels of my table are not finished on the bottom (underside) of the panel - the particle board is clearly visible. I quickly read the feedback and thought I was getting a solid wood product, I have to admit the price would have been low for a solid wood table. So I guess I got what I paid for, it will fit my use. I attached a photo to show the particle board.
customer_reviews.author: Rwgems

customer_reviews.title: Small and pretty, loose bottom shelf
customer_reviews.text: True to size- it's short in height! 'A' for easy leg assembly and attractiveness. Nice finish. But Bottom shelf has no holes for the provided screws. I don't own a drill, so I left the bottom panel sitting atop the wooden corner wedges. This doesn't affect function, only poses potential problem for transporting table as one piece. Again, very pretty, just short, and manufacturing doesn't allow assembler to afix bottom panel as described in instruction booklet without drilling.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea A.

customer_reviews.title: Scuffed, but otherwise perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Quite pleased with this table! It was the perfect size for its intended space, SUPER easy to put together (took about 10 minutes). Very cute and useful. The only thing is it came dirty, with a pretty noticable scuff on the shelf where the black wore away to the wood underneath. It'll usually be covered by something, so I don't mind, but it's a little disappointing in that respect.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: It's easy enough to assemble and pretty sturdy for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's easy enough to assemble and pretty sturdy for the price. I wish it wasn't as glossy a finish because it picks up scuffs and prints too easily. Mine arrived with some minor scuffs on it, but they're fortunately not particularly visible with the lighting in the room. I use this to hold a PC that weighs somewhere in the neighborhood of 45 lbs. I wouldn't put anything more than that on it but it's holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua G.

customer_reviews.title: Great little table!
customer_reviews.text: I had this together in under 15 minutes. 4 bolts and 4 screws, that's it! Sturdy little table with a nice finish. Perfect for holding a lamp and a few essentials in between two chairs. Well packaged and arrived with no mars or scuffs. Speedy delivery too. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive narrow table- excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice attractive solid table, perfect for the narrow space I have for a bedside table. Took only a few minutes for my son to put it together-probably would have taken longer for me (senior) as he needed to put in 4 screws with no apparent holes drilled underneath. I’m very pleased- excellent value for the price. To be honest, it holds its own with a matching but twice the size (solid wood and more complex- custom made) bedside table on the other side from Ethan Allen that cost over $500!
customer_reviews.author: NW Alley

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these at once, we ad one at work so I was familiar with the quality. Quality wise, it's ok, sturdy, looks nice enough, but 1 of them had no hardware. It's only 4 bolts but there is no way to contact the company through amazon it seems. There might be, but they don't make it easy so I get to make a trip to the hardware store and will still likely have to modify the bolts for length. I liked this product for the price and the ease of setup but now I'm stuck with a piece of useless furniture unless I fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Crown Mark Pierce Chairside Table, Espresso
product_meta.description: Color:EspressoVersatile style and function combine with this chairside table. The transitional design features clean lines, timeless styling, a spacious fixed shelf and a generously sized top, perfect for displaying books, ornaments and more! The chic black finish complements any transitional color palette.Quality, competitive value and rich style are all characteristics of Crown Mark. Founded in Houston, Texas in 1983, Crown Mark’s team of quality control specialists and style research team helps the company develop and produce stylish furniture that ranges from classic to contemporary. With distribution centers and markets across the country, Crown Mark is a leader in quality furniture production.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars5,196 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
